main.name: Vy Dinh
main.bio: Experienced Software Engineer with a demonstrated history of more than 3 years working in the Information Technology.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

work.title: Software Engineer - Tradeshift team
work.description:
Worked as a key product developer, to take ownership of building the Accounts Receivable Lite app. Launch new features, as well as improving existing features for apps: Request for Quotation, Purchase Order, Payment Request. 

Fixed bugs on development tracks and customer’s requests. 

Implemented test scenarios. 

Worked closely with SE, QA, PM to resolve issues raised by customers asap.

work.title: Software Engineer - Cloud Native team
work.description:
Work closely and support the team to deploy CSCF to the Cloud Infrastructure Open-stack following distributed architecture, as well as configure the operating system on the servers. 

Study Docker, Kubernetes, AWS.

work.title: Software Engineer - Call Session Control Function (CSCF) team
work.description:
Work in a cross-functional team to develop and maintain new features (e.g., the feature helps the customer gets faster call set-uptimes and higher KPIs for VoLTE quality in their networks to win the mobile network competition). 

Worked closely with the team, Project Owner, and System Manager in Sweden to clarify requirements, finding and implementing solutions. 

Implemented Unit test, Function test, conducted Early System test, Load test. 

Supporting the delivery task.

projects.title: Hey Device
projects.category: An open source device that reminds the development team to focus on their continuous integration and fix appearing bugs

projects.title: Thesis
projects.category: Velocity Measurement of The Moving Object Using Microwave Motion Sensor Module

testimonials.text:
I just wanted to say a big thank to Vy for her great contribution to our team. 
It was a pleasure to work with you, you have been putting a lot of energy in our team work since the beginning. VoLTE, for example, was very important for customer and you did a great work on this. 
 Team is really lucky to have you on board.
testimonials.user: Eduardo . Product Owner at DEK Technologies
